#summary This page describes how to add ACRA dependency to your Maven project

= Maven =

If you use Maven in your Android project, you need to add the ACRA repository and the ACRA dependency to your pom.xml. 

== Releases ==

_There is no Maven stable release of ACRA yet. Please use the SNAPSHOT dependency._

You will need the following repository in your Maven project:

{{{
<repositories>
    <repository>
        <id>acra-releases</id>
        <url>http://acra.googlecode.com/svn/repository/releases</url>
    </repository>
</repositories>
}}}

As well as the following dependency:

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.acra</groupId>
    <artifactId>acra</artifactId>
    <version>X.X.X</version>
</dependency>
}}}

== Snapshots ==

You will need the following repository in your Maven project:

{{{
<repositories>
    <repository>
        <id>acra-snapshots</id>
        <url>http://acra.googlecode.com/svn/repository/snapshots</url>
    </repository>
</repositories>
}}}

As well as the following dependency:

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.acra</groupId>
    <artifactId>acra</artifactId>
    <version>3.1.2-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>
}}}
